column4: Hello, can someone try to swich desktop in unity using ctrl+alt+up+left while on the down right desktop? does it work?
it works for me, although I must ask which version of unity are you running?
um the one with oneiric(?) i can't move that way, all other directions work but not that one :S
i can move first to left and then up, or first up and then left but not change directly by pressing both same time
this works tough from left up to down right
hmm that's wierd. I also have that problem...
if I press up + left not simultaneously but quickly in succession then it works
yeah a bug I guess...and I am running Precise
i wonder if this has been reported
or maybe i'm only one paying attension to such minor things ^^
nice catch though :)...we want a pixel perfect precise!
can you report a bug and provide the bug report link?
ok, time to try ubuntu-bug for first time :P
since it is related to compiz package
uh and i already put unity
